main event: The UFO sighting took place on 6 December 1957 in Long Island, New York, and involved an elongated object with a pencil-like shape, blue-white color, and a reddish and bluish-white appearance. The object was observed with a luminous trail and a swishing sound, lasting for approximately 5 seconds.
interesting points: The UFO was described as having a forward portion with a blue-white color and a reddish and bluish-white appearance, resembling a rocket or missile.
The sighting involved both radar and visual observation, indicating a potentially significant event.
The UFO was reported to move at high speeds from a bearing of 330 N-S and was accompanied by a swishing sound.
Observations of the UFO were made in multiple locations across Long Island, including Islip, Syosset, Hicksville, Farmingdale, and Long Beach.
The disappearance of the UFO was reported in an unidentified manner, adding to the mystery of the sighting.
sighted object: elongated object with pencil-like shape and reddish-blue appearance
photographs: No photographs were included in the report
